SELECT br.borrow_nid AS borrowNid, u.user_id AS userId, u.username AS borrowUserName, binfo.name AS borrowName, b.borrow_style AS borrowStyle, b.project_Type AS projectType, bpt.borrow_name AS projectTypeName, CASE WHEN b.borrow_style = 'endday' THEN CONCAT(b.borrow_period, '天') ELSE CONCAT(b.borrow_period, '个月') END AS borrowPeriod, b.borrow_Apr AS borrowApr, b.borrow_account_yes AS borrowAccount, b.borrow_account_yes AS borrowAccountYes, bs.name AS repayType, b.verify_time As verifyTime, bs.nid AS repayStyleType, binfo.repay_org_name, b.create_user_name, b.regist_user_name, b.repay_account_capital AS repayAccountCapital, b.repay_account_interest AS repayAccountInterest, b.repay_account_all repayAccountAll, b.borrow_manager AS borrowManager, br.repay_fee AS repayFee, b.repay_account_capital_yes AS repayAccountCapitalYes, b.repay_account_interest_yes AS repayAccountInterestYes, b.repay_account_yes AS repayAccountYes, b.repay_account_capital-b.repay_account_capital_yes AS repayAccountCapitalWait, b.repay_account_interest_wait AS repayAccountInterestWait, b.repay_account_wait AS repayAccountWait, b.status AS status, if(br.repay_status=0 and br.advance_status=3 ,'2',br.repay_status) as repayStatus, if(b.repay_last_time='' OR b.repay_last_time='0' OR b.repay_last_time='null','',FROM_UNIXTIME( b.repay_last_time, '%Y-%m-%d' )) AS repayLastTime, if(br.repay_time='' OR br.repay_time='0' OR br.repay_time='null','',FROM_UNIXTIME( br.repay_time, '%Y-%m-%d' )) AS repayNextTime, IF ( br.repay_status=1 AND br.repay_action_time > 0 , CASE br.repay_money_source WHEN 1 THEN '借款人还款' WHEN 2 THEN '机构垫付' WHEN 3 THEN '保证金垫付' ELSE '借款人还款' END , '' ) AS repayMoneySource, CASE WHEN br.repay_action_time > 0 AND br.repay_status=1 THEN FROM_UNIXTIME(br.repay_action_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ELSE '' END as repayActionTime, b.plan_nid,
hic.inst_name as instName,
binfo.borrow_measures_instit as webName, rflg.order_id AS freezeOrderId, br.repay_fee-b.repay_fee_normal as repayFeeWait, b.repay_fee_normal as repayFeeYes, br.charge_interest as chargeInterest, br.charge_penalty_interest as chargePenaltyInterest, br.late_interest as lateInterest, b.borrow_full_time as borrowFullTime, b.recover_last_time as recoverLastTime FROM ht_borrow AS b INNER JOIN ht_borrow_repay AS br on b.borrow_nid=br.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_r_user u ON b.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info AS binfo on b.borrow_nid=binfo.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_style AS bs on b.borrow_style=bs.nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_type bpt ON bpt.borrow_cd = CAST(b.project_type AS CHAR) LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_inst_config hic on binfo.inst_code = hic.inst_code LEFT JOIN ht_bank_repay_freeze_log rflg on rflg.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid and rflg.del_flag = 0
ORDER BY br.id DESC
LIMIT #{limitStart} , #{limitEnd}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ht_borrow AS b INNER JOIN ht_borrow_repay AS br on b.borrow_nid=br.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_r_user u ON b.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info AS binfo on b.borrow_nid=binfo.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_style AS bs on b.borrow_style=bs.nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_type bpt ON bpt.borrow_cd = CAST(b.project_type AS CHAR)
LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_inst_config hic on binfo.inst_code = hic.inst_code LEFT JOIN ht_bank_repay_freeze_log rflg on rflg.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid and rflg.del_flag = 0

SELECT SUM(b.borrow_account_yes) AS borrowAccountYes, SUM(b.repay_account_all) AS repayAccountAll, SUM(br.repay_fee) AS repayFee, SUM(b.repay_account_interest) as repayAccountInterestAll, SUM(b.repay_account_capital_yes) as repayAccountCapitalYesAll, SUM(b.repay_account_interest_yes) as repayAccountInterestYesAll, SUM(b.repay_fee_normal)as repayFeeYesAll, SUM(b.repay_account_capital-b.repay_account_capital_yes)as repayAccountCapitalWaitAll, SUM(b.repay_account_interest_wait)as repayAccountInterestWaitAll, SUM(br.repay_fee-b.repay_fee_normal)as repayFeeWaitAll FROM ht_borrow AS b INNER JOIN ht_borrow_repay AS br on b.borrow_nid=br.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_r_user u ON b.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info AS binfo on b.borrow_nid=binfo.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_style AS bs on b.borrow_style=bs.nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_type bpt ON bpt.borrow_cd = CAST(b.project_type AS CHAR)
LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_inst_config hic on binfo.inst_code = hic.inst_code LEFT JOIN ht_bank_repay_freeze_log rflg on rflg.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid and rflg.del_flag = 0

select SUM(rp.repay_capital) AS repayCapital, SUM(rp.repay_interest) AS repayInterest, SUM(rp.repay_account) AS repayAccount, SUM(rp.repay_fee) AS repayFee from ht_borrow_repay_plan AS rp INNER JOIN ht_borrow AS b ON rp.borrow_nid=b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info AS binfo on b.borrow_nid=binfo.borrow_nid

select *from( SELECT br.nid AS nid, br.borrow_nid AS borrowNid, u.user_id AS userId, u.username AS borrowUserName, binfo.NAME AS borrowName, hic.inst_name AS instName, bpt.borrow_name AS projectTypeName, CASE WHEN b.borrow_style = 'endday' THEN CONCAT(b.borrow_period, '天') ELSE CONCAT(b.borrow_period, '个月') END AS borrowPeriod, b.borrow_Apr AS borrowApr, b.borrow_account_yes AS borrowAccount, b.borrow_account_yes AS borrowAccountYes, bs. NAME AS repayType, FROM_UNIXTIME(b.verify_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS verify_time, '1' AS repayPeriod, b.repay_account_capital AS repayCapital, b.repay_account_interest AS repayInterest, b.repay_account_all AS repayAccount, br.repay_fee AS repayFee, '' AS tiqiantianshu, '' AS shaohuanlixi, '' AS yanqitianshu, '' AS yanqilixi, '' AS yuqitianshu, '' AS yuqilixi, '' AS yinghuanzonge, '' AS shihuanzonge,
IF ( b. STATUS = 4, 0,
IF (b. STATUS = 5, 1, '') ) AS STATUS, CASE WHEN br.repay_action_time > 0 AND br.repay_status = 1 THEN FROM_UNIXTIME( br.repay_action_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) ELSE '' END AS repayActionTime,
IF ( b.repay_last_time = '' OR b.repay_last_time = '0' OR b.repay_last_time = 'null', '', FROM_UNIXTIME( b.repay_last_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) ) AS repayLastTime,
IF ( br.repay_status = 1 AND br.repay_action_time > 0, CASE br.repay_money_source WHEN 1 THEN '借款人还款' WHEN 2 THEN '机构垫付' WHEN 3 THEN '保证金垫付' ELSE '借款人还款' END, '' ) AS repayMoneySource FROM ht_borrow AS b INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info AS binfo on b.borrow_nid=binfo.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_repay AS br on b.borrow_nid=br.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_r_user u ON b.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_style AS bs on b.borrow_style=bs.nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_type bpt ON bpt.borrow_cd = CAST(b.project_type AS CHAR) LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_apicron as ba on b.borrow_nid = ba.borrow_nid and ba.api_type = 1 and ba.status <> 6 LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_inst_config hic on binfo.inst_code = hic.inst_code
AND b.borrow_style in ('end','endday') UNION ALL SELECT rp.nid AS nid, b.borrow_nid AS borrowNid, u.user_id AS userId, u.username AS borrowUserName, binfo.NAME AS borrowName, hic.inst_name AS instName, CASE WHEN b.project_Type = 0 THEN '汇保贷' WHEN b.project_Type = 1 THEN '汇典贷' WHEN b.project_Type = 2 THEN '汇小贷' WHEN b.project_Type = 3 THEN '汇车贷' WHEN b.project_Type = 4 THEN '新手标' END AS projectTypeName, CONCAT(b.borrow_period, '个月') AS borrowPeriod, b.borrow_Apr AS borrowApr, b.account AS borrowAccount, b.borrow_account_yes AS borrowAccountYes, bs. NAME AS repayType, FROM_UNIXTIME(b.verify_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS verify_time, rp.repay_period AS repayPeriod, rp.repay_capital AS repayCapital, rp.repay_interest AS repayInterest, rp.repay_account AS repayAccount, rp.repay_fee AS repayFee, '' AS tiqiantianshu, '' AS shaohuanlixi, '' AS yanqitianshu, '' AS yanqilixi, '' AS yuqitianshu, '' AS yuqilixi, '' AS yinghuanzonge, '' AS shihuanzonge, rp.repay_status AS STATUS,
IF ( rp.repay_action_time = '' OR rp.repay_action_time = '0' OR rp.repay_action_time = 'null', '', FROM_UNIXTIME( rp.repay_action_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) ) AS repayActionTime,
IF ( rp.repay_time = '' OR rp.repay_time = '0' OR rp.repay_time = 'null', '', FROM_UNIXTIME(rp.repay_time, '%Y-%m-%d') ) AS repayLastTime,
IF ( rp.repay_action_time IS NULL OR rp.repay_action_time = '' OR rp.repay_action_time = '0', '', CASE rp.repay_money_source WHEN 1 THEN '借款人还款' WHEN 2 THEN '机构垫付' WHEN 3 THEN '保证金垫付' ELSE '借款人还款' END ) AS repayMoneySource from ht_borrow_repay_plan AS rp INNER JOIN ht_borrow AS b ON rp.borrow_nid=b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info AS binfo on b.borrow_nid=binfo.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_style AS bs on b.borrow_style=bs.nid LEFT JOIN ht_r_user u ON b.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_inst_config hic ON hic.inst_code = binfo.inst_code
AND b.borrow_style in ('principal','month','endmonth') ORDER BY verify_time DESC,borrowNid ASC, repayPeriod+0 ASC) as resultMap
LIMIT #{limitStart} , #{limitEnd}

NAME AS borrowName, hic.inst_name AS instName, bpt.borrow_name AS projectTypeName, CASE WHEN b.borrow_style = 'endday' THEN CONCAT(b.borrow_period, '天') ELSE CONCAT(b.borrow_period, '个月') END AS borrowPeriod, b.borrow_Apr AS borrowApr, b.borrow_account_yes AS borrowAccount, b.borrow_account_yes AS borrowAccountYes, bs. STATUS = 4, 0,
IF (b. STATUS = 5, 1, '') ) AS STATUS, CASE WHEN br.repay_action_time > 0 AND br.repay_status = 1 THEN FROM_UNIXTIME( br.repay_action_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) ELSE '' END AS repayActionTime,
IF ( b.repay_last_time = '' OR b.repay_last_time = '0' OR b.repay_last_time = 'null', '', FROM_UNIXTIME( b.repay_last_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) ) AS repayLastTime,
IF ( br.repay_status = 1 AND br.repay_action_time > 0, CASE br.repay_money_source WHEN 1 THEN '借款人还款' WHEN 2 THEN '机构垫付' WHEN 3 THEN '保证金垫付' ELSE '借款人还款' END, '' ) AS repayMoneySource, b.repay_account_capital-b.repay_account_capital_yes AS repayAccountCapitalWait, b.repay_account_interest_wait AS repayAccountInterestWait FROM ht_borrow AS b INNER JOIN ht_borrow_repay AS br ON b.borrow_nid = br.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info hbi ON b.borrow_nid=hbi.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_r_user u ON b.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_style AS bs ON b.borrow_style = bs.nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_type bpt ON bpt.borrow_cd = CAST(b.project_type AS CHAR) LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_apicron as ba ON b.borrow_nid = ba.borrow_nid and ba.api_type = 1 and ba.status <> 6 LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_inst_config hic ON hbi.inst_code = hic.inst_code
AND b.borrow_style in ('end','endday') UNION ALL SELECT b.plan_nid as planNid, hbi.repay_org_name as repayOrgName, b.recover_last_time as recoverLastTime, rp.repay_capital_yes as repayAccountCapitalYes, rp.repay_interest_yes as repayAccountInterestYes, rp.charge_interest as chargeInterest, rp.charge_penalty_interest as chargePenaltyInterest, if(rp.repay_type='wait_yes',rp.repay_fee,0) as yihuanfuwufei, rp.nid AS nid, b.borrow_nid AS borrowNid, u.user_id AS userId, u.username AS borrowUserName, hbi. NAME AS borrowName, hic.inst_name AS instName, bpt.borrow_name AS projectTypeName, CONCAT(b.borrow_period, '个月') AS borrowPeriod, b.borrow_Apr AS borrowApr, b.account AS borrowAccount, b.borrow_account_yes AS borrowAccountYes, bs. NAME AS repayType, FROM_UNIXTIME(b.verify_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS verify_time, rp.repay_period AS repayPeriod, rp.repay_capital AS repayCapital, rp.repay_interest AS repayInterest, rp.repay_account AS repayAccount, rp.repay_fee AS repayFee, rp.charge_days AS tiqiantianshu, rp.charge_interest AS shaohuanlixi, '' AS yanqitianshu, '' AS yanqilixi, rp.late_days AS yuqitianshu, rp.late_interest AS yuqilixi, b.repay_account_all AS yinghuanzonge, b.repay_account_yes AS shihuanzonge, rp.repay_status AS STATUS,
IF ( rp.repay_action_time = '' OR rp.repay_action_time = '0' OR rp.repay_action_time = 'null', '', FROM_UNIXTIME( rp.repay_action_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) ) AS repayActionTime,
IF ( rp.repay_time = '' OR rp.repay_time = '0' OR rp.repay_time = 'null', '', FROM_UNIXTIME(rp.repay_time, '%Y-%m-%d') ) AS repayLastTime,
IF ( rp.repay_action_time IS NULL OR rp.repay_action_time = '' OR rp.repay_action_time = '0', '', CASE rp.repay_money_source WHEN 1 THEN '借款人还款' WHEN 2 THEN '机构垫付' WHEN 3 THEN '保证金垫付' ELSE '借款人还款' END ) AS repayMoneySource, b.repay_account_capital-b.repay_account_capital_yes AS repayAccountCapitalWait, b.repay_account_interest_wait AS repayAccountInterestWait FROM ht_borrow_repay_plan AS rp INNER JOIN ht_borrow AS b ON rp.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info hbi ON b.borrow_nid=hbi.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_style AS bs ON b.borrow_style = bs.nid LEFT JOIN ht_r_user u ON b.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_inst_config hic ON hic.inst_code = hbi.inst_code LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_repay br ON br.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_type bpt ON bpt.borrow_cd = CAST(b.project_type AS CHAR)
ORDER BY verify_time ASC,borrowNid ASC, repayPeriod+0 ASC) t
LIMIT #{limitStart} , #{limitEnd}

SELECT b.borrow_nid, b.user_id, binfo.`name` AS borrow_name, b.borrow_user_name username, FORMAT(b.account, 2) AS account, b.borrow_style, bs.`name` AS borrow_style_name, binfo.project_type, bpt.borrow_name AS project_type_name, CASE WHEN borrow_style = 'endday' THEN CONCAT(b.borrow_period, '天') ELSE CONCAT(b.borrow_period, '个月') END borrow_period, b.borrow_apr, FORMAT(b.borrow_account_yes, 2) AS borrow_account_yes, IF(b.repay_last_time IS NULL OR b.repay_last_time = '' OR b.repay_last_time='0' OR b.repay_last_time = 'null', '', FROM_UNIXTIME(b.repay_last_time, '%Y-%m-%d' )) AS repay_last_time, b.repay_account_wait, b.repay_account_interest_wait+repay_account_capital_wait as interestCapitalWait, binfo.repay_org_name, b.recover_last_time as recoverLastTime, b.repay_account_all+b.borrow_service repayAccountAll, b.repay_account_all as principalInterest FROM ht_borrow b INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info binfo ON b.borrow_nid = binfo.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_style bs ON bs.nid = b.borrow_style LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_type bpt ON bpt.borrow_cd = binfo.project_type WHERE b.borrow_nid = #{borrowNid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
